main event: An RB-26 observed a bright orange glow traveling at high speed in Korea.
interesting points: The object was traveling at least 600 mph at a 120 degree heading at 7000 ft.,The glow appeared to be smaller than a jet aircraft exhaust.,The glow did not diminish but went out suddenly.,The navigator commented that the glow resembled a World War II V-1 rocket.,The sighting involved a military aircraft.
